common.app-description: This is a simple React application with TypeScript, Material-UI, Redux, and i18n support.
error.not-found-description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
page.reports.card.accruals.description: Shows balance details of leave types with accrual rates.
page.reports.card.balances.description: Shows the total and used balance for each leave type.
page.reports.card.carry.description: Shows the carried-over balance details for the past and current year.
page.reports.card.total.description: Shows the employees total used balance.
